item.name: Jeremiah One
item.description: Jeremiah One is a name borne of owner Jonathon Hyams' 20 years' experience in the wine industry. He has set up a virtual winery business, precisely sourcing contract-grown grapes and winemakers to match, spanning Clare Valley Riesling; Adelaide Hills Sauvignon Blanc, Pinot Grigio and Chardonnay; Lenswood Pinot Noir; and Adelaide Hills/Clare Valley Merlot.
